results.title: Metformin Attenuates Bone Cancer Pain by Reducing TRPV1 and ASIC3 Expression

results.title: Metformin inhibits spontaneous excitatory postsynaptic currents in spinal dorsal cord neurons from paclitaxel-treated rats
results.text_hl: Intrathecal administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ also reversed the @CHEMICAL_Paclitaxel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017239 @@@paclitaxel@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@mechanical allodynia@@@.

results.title: Metformin inhibits paclitaxel-induced mechanical allodynia by activating opioidergic pathways and reducing cytokines production in the dorsal root ganglia and thalamus.
results.text_hl: After a single p.o. administration, the two highest doses of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (500 and 1000 mg/kg) attenuated the @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@mechanical allodynia@@@.

results.title: Metformin protects from oxaliplatin induced peripheral neuropathy in rats
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Oxaliplatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077150 @@@Oxaliplatin@@@ induced @DISEASE_Nerve_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D009410 @@@degeneration of axons@@@ in explants of dorsal root ganglia, and this could be prevented by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment. @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rats@@@ exposed to @CHEMICAL_Oxaliplatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077150 @@@oxaliplatin@@@ developed degeneration of intraepidermal fibers, activation of astrocytes in the spinal cord and @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@mechanical and cold hyperalgesia@@@, all of which were prevented by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ co-administration.

citations.NLM: Martinez NW, Sánchez A, Diaz P, Broekhuizen R, Godoy J, Mondaca S, Catenaccio A, Macanas P, Nervi B, Calvo M, Court FA. Metformin protects from oxaliplatin induced peripheral neuropathy in rats Neurobiol Pain. 2020 Aug-Dec;8():100048. PMID: 32490289

results.title: Synergism between metformin and analgesics/vitamin B12 in a model of painful diabetic neuropathy.
results.text_hl: Two-drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ combinations with analgesics/@CHEMICAL_Vitamin_B_12 @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014805 @@@vitamin B12@@@ also dose-dependently reduced @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@mechanical hyperalgesia@@@.

citations.NLM: Pecikoza U, Tomić M, Nastić K, Micov A, Stepanović-Petrović R. Synergism between metformin and analgesics/vitamin B12 in a model of painful diabetic neuropathy. Biomed Pharmacother. 2022 Sep;153():113441. PMID: 36076556

results.title: The Antinociceptive Effects and Sex-Specific Neurotransmitter Modulation of Metformin in a Mouse Model of Fibromyalgia.
results.text_hl: After the administration of 200 mg/kg @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to male and female @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, the @DISEASE_Fibromyalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D005356 @@@FM@@@-related symptoms were assessed, including @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@mechanical allodynia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@thermal hyperalgesia@@@, and @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depressive@@@-like behaviors.

citations.NLM: AboTaleb HA, Alturkistani HA, Abd El-Aziz GS, Hindi EA, Halawani MM, Al-Thepyani MA, Alghamdi BS. The Antinociceptive Effects and Sex-Specific Neurotransmitter Modulation of Metformin in a Mouse Model of Fibromyalgia. Cells. 2024 Nov 30;13(23):. PMID: 39682734

results.title: Metformin attenuates diabetic neuropathic pain via AMPK/NF-kappaB signaling pathway in dorsal root ganglion of diabetic rats.
results.text_hl: In the present study, we showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ was capable of attenuating @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ induced @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@mechanical allodynia@@@, and the analgesia effect could be blocked by Compound C (an @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@ inhibitor).

citations.NLM: Cao XJ, Wu R, Qian HY, Chen X, Zhu HY, Xu GY, Sun YZ, Zhang PA. Metformin attenuates diabetic neuropathic pain via AMPK/NF-kappaB signaling pathway in dorsal root ganglion of diabetic rats. Brain Res. 2021 Dec 1;1772():147663. PMID: 34555415

results.title: Early Treatment With Metformin in a Mice Model of Complex Regional Pain Syndrome Reduces Pain and Edema.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: The important finding of this study was that early treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduces @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@mechanical allodynia@@@ in a @DISEASE_Complex_Regional_Pain_Syndromes @DISEASE_MESH:D020918 @@@complex regional pain syndrome@@@ model in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Das V, Kroin JS, Moric M, McCarthy RJ, Buvanendran A. Early Treatment With Metformin in a Mice Model of Complex Regional Pain Syndrome Reduces Pain and Edema. Anesth Analg. 2020 Feb;130(2):525-534. PMID: 30801357

results.title: Metformin effect in models of inflammation is associated with activation of ATP-dependent potassium channels and inhibition of tumor necrosis factor-alpha production.
results.text_hl: In the model of @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@mechanical allodynia@@@ and paw @DISEASE_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@edema@@@ induced by @CHEMICAL_Carrageenan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002351 @@@carrageenan@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ also exhibited activity when administered after (1 h) the @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ stimulus.

results.title: Effect of Metformin on Epidermal Neural Crest Stem Cells and Their Potential Application in Ameliorating Paclitaxel-induced Neurotoxicity Phenotype.
results.text_hl: To do so, @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@thermal hyperalgesia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@mechanical allodynia@@@, and spatial learning and memory tests were evaluated by Hotplate, Von Frey, and Morris water maze tests.
